channel.title: CVE Feed for Foreman -- foreman
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foreman -- foreman

item.title: CVE-2017-7505|2024-08-05T16:04:11.828Z -- foreman -- foreman
item.description: Foreman since version 1.5 is vulnerable to an incorrect authorization check due to which users with user management permission who are assigned to some organization(s) can do all operations granted by these permissions on all administrator user object outside of their scope, such as editing global admin accounts including changing their passwords.

item.title: CVE-2017-7535|2024-08-05T16:04:11.865Z -- foreman -- foreman
item.description: foreman before version 1.16.0 is vulnerable to a stored XSS in organizations/locations assignment to hosts. Exploiting this requires a user to actively assign hosts to an organization that contains html in its name which is visible to the user prior to taking action.
